name: AntiLobotomy
description: Disables difficulty faces, SFX, and Song triggers from loading in levels related to lobotomies.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description:
Toggles the mod on levels whose names are related to lobotomies.
By default, this does not affect levels with star/moon ratings until you enable the "Enabled on Rated Levels" option.

enableOnRated.name: Enabled on Rated Levels
enableOnRated.description:
Toggles the mod on levels whose names are related to lobotomies and have star/moon ratings.
Requires previous setting to be enabled.

disableNormalFace.name: Disable Normal Difficulty Face
disableNormalFace.description: Disables the normal difficulty face decoration on levels related to lobotomies.

disableAllFaces.name: Disable All Difficulty Faces
disableAllFaces.description:
Disables all difficulty face decorations on levels related to lobotomies.
Does not require previous setting to be enabled.

disableSFX.name: Disable SFX triggers
disableSFX.description: Disables all SFX triggers on levels related to lobotomies.

disableSong.name: Disable Song Triggers
disableSong.description: Disables all Song triggers on levels related to lobotomies.
